Q: Dronis 20 is having what type of side effect? Patient is suffering from endometriotic cyst from 5 months. latest after operation our local doctor suggested for Dronis 20 for coming 6 months. Shall we can go ahead with same? YYYY@YYYY
A: Hi, Chat Doctor.  Its common side effects include nausea, stomach pain, headache (migraine), breast pain, weight gain, irregular menstrual bleeding, clot in the veins of the leg, and high blood pressure. Yes, you can go ahead with the prescribed treatment and during the course of the treatment if you suffer from the troublesome side effects you may consult your treating doctor.
